attributes.additional_details: We need you the british people and the british leader david cameron take a stand do something for this world joseph kony he has been at large for over 20 years an no  country has done anything to stop it you the people the government can stop this youcan enter uganda and take down the lra this is our time your time we can take them down stop their killings stop their evil regime end it not for us but for the rest of humanity this is first of many if we can take down kony we can take them all
